00036 void Compass::init( CConfigFile & config ) {
00037 
00038         this->loadConfig(config,"COMPASS");
00039         this->loadConfig_sensorSpecific(config,"COMPASS");
00040         this->initialize();
00041         this->doProcess();
00042 
00043 }
00044 void Compass::doProcess() {
00045         string data;
00046 
00047         bool booleanness = true;
00048         data = this->serialPort.ReadString(100,&booleanness, "\n\r");
00049         this->parseResponse(data);
00050 
00051 }

00053 void Compass::dumpData( std::ostream & out ) {
00054         out << "************" << endl;
00055         out << "Compass" << endl;
00056         out << this->yaw << ", " << this->pitch << ", " << this->roll << " Valid: " << this->yawStatus << this->pitchStatus << this->rollStatus << endl;
00057         out << "************" << endl;
00058 }

00060 void Compass::loadConfig_sensorSpecific( const mrpt::utils::CConfigFileBase& config, const std::string& sectionName ) {
00061 
00062         string value = config.read_string(sectionName, "COM_port_LIN", "/dev/ttyS1" );
00063         this->serialPort.open(value);
00064 
00065         int baudRate = config.read_int(sectionName, "baudRate", 19200 );
00066 
00067         this->serialPort.setConfig( baudRate, 0, 8, 1 );
00068 
00069         string writeValue = "#FA0.3=1*26\n\r";//Command to turn on the compass
00070         this->serialPort.WriteBuffer(writeValue.c_str(), writeValue.length());
00071         string readValue;
00072         bool to = false;
00073         readValue = this->serialPort.ReadString(1000,&to,"\n\r");
00074         this->degrees = config.read_bool("COMPASS","degrees",false);
00075 
00076 }

00083 void Compass::parseResponse( const std::string& data ) {
00084 
00085         string buffer = data;
00086         string header = "";
00087 
00088         boost::replace_all( buffer, ",", " " );//replace the commas with spaces so the stringstream parser will parse how we want
00089         stringstream s(buffer);
00090 
00091         s >> header;
00092         s >> this->yaw;
00093         s >> this->yawStatus;
00094         s >> this->pitch;
00095         s >> this->pitchStatus;
00096         s >> this->roll;
00097         s >> this->rollStatus;
00098 
00099 }

00102         this->yaw = 0;
00103         this->pitch = 0;
00104         this->roll = 0;
00105         this->yawStatus = "";
00106         this->pitchStatus = "";
00107         this->rollStatus = "";
00108 }

00110 std::string Compass::computeChecksum( const std::string & sentence ) {
00111 
00112         const int strLen = sentence.length();
00113 
00114         int i = 0, j = 0;
00115         for( i = 0; i < strLen && '$' != sentence.at(i) && '#' != sentence.at(i); ++i );
00116         if( strLen <= i ) return "";
00117 
00118         ++i;
00119         for( j = i; j < strLen && '*' != sentence.at(j); ++j );
00120         if( strLen <= j ) return "";
00121 
00122         unsigned char checksum = 0;
00123         for( ; i != j; ++i ) checksum ^= sentence.at(i);
00124 
00125         unsigned char high = (checksum & 0xF0) >> 4;
00126         unsigned char low = checksum & 0x0F;
00127 
00128         if( 0 <= high && high <= 9 ) high += 0x30;
00129         else if( 10 <= high && high <= 15 ) high += 0x40;
00130 
00131         if( 0 <= low && low <= 9 ) low += 0x30;
00132         else if( 10 <= low && low <= 15 ) low += 0x40;
00133 
00134         stringstream stream;
00135         stream << high;
00136         stream << low;
00137         return stream.str();
00138 }
